MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am to conduct repairs to a damaged underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:27am on the 24th of April 2021
